content.question: Which conflict was Franklin referring to when he described colonial contributions to the “last war”?

choices.label: The Seven Years’ War (the French and Indian War)

content.answer: The Seven Years’ War (the French and Indian War)

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
